attributes.action: Make available the full calibration certificates of all speed cameras on local council websites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speed cameras are not perfectly accurate as some local authorities would like us to think. The publication of calibration certificates
would indicate for example if the were accurate to say +/- 3 mph. Every camera
installation is unique and should be tested in situ with real motor vehicles
otherwise there can be no absolute certaintity that it is working correctly. Home office approval is no guarantee as toilets in prison cells also have to be approved. All electronic equipment is subject to errors caused by vibration,temperature etc. Doppler radar can be subject to all sorts odd reflections from vehicles travelling in the opposite direction as one example.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
